span.span: Represents a fault that can have an associated HTTP status code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当使用 WCF REST 终结点（ 和 或 ）时，将相应地设置响应的 HTTP 状态代码。When using a WCF REST endpoint ( and or ) the HTTP status code on the response is set accordingly. 但是， 可以与非 REST 终结点一起使用，并且其行为与常规的 类似。However, can be used with non-REST endpoints and behaves like a regular . 使用此类可返回使用与操作相同的格式的错误详细信息。Use this class to return error details using the same format as the operation.
